mapper.select: SELECT a.POWR AS powrStatus, a.WTTP AS tempStatus, a.DEVC_ID AS deviceId, a.OPMD AS modeValue, a.CWTP AS currentTemp, b.USER_ID AS userId FROM TBR_OPR_DEVICE_STATUS a INNER JOIN TBT_OPR_DEVICE_REGIST b ON a.DEVC_ID = b.DEVC_ID WHERE a.DEVC_ID = #{deviceId}
SELECT a.SUB_ID AS deviceId, a.DEVC_MODL_CD AS deviceModelCode, b.USER_ID AS userId FROM TBR_OPR_DEVICE_STATUS a INNER JOIN TBT_OPR_DEVICE_REGIST b ON a.PR_ID = b.DEVC_ID WHERE a.PR_ID = #{deviceId}
